definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
a breed of horse/variant of 歡|欢[huan1]
CCTV New Year's Gala, Chinese New Year special/abbr. to 春晚[Chun1 Wan3]
pinyin: Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4

sentences.english: I have a new dress for my birthday pary.
sentences.chinese: 我有一个生日联欢会的新连衣裙。

sentences.english: There is going to be a get-together at the playground tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 明天将在操场上举行联欢会。

sentences.english: But also to be held tomorrow in the class get-together, there will be more exciting.
sentences.chinese: 明天在班里还要举行联欢会，会有更精彩的表现。

sentences.english: Wing tiger group in the warm atmosphere of bayi party held in.
sentences.chinese: 翼虎团八一联欢会在热烈的氛围中举行。

sentences.english: Now integration get-togethers usually consider mixed drama singing as a fixed programme.
sentences.chinese: 联欢会经常会把戏曲联唱节目作为一个固定的节目。

sentences.english: On New Year's eve, at 8 o 'clock came, also began in the Spring Festival gala.
sentences.chinese: 除夕之夜，8点来了，春节联欢晚会也开始了。

sentences.english: It's next to impossible to catch a taxi at night during the year- end party season.
sentences.chinese: 联欢会季节，晚上是几乎不可能叫到计程车的。

sentences.english: At this point, the square to participate in a get-together of people issued flood of cheers.
sentences.chinese: 此时，广场上参加联欢的民众发出潮水般的欢呼声。

sentences.english: At the evening party, we also appreciate the various folk song and dance.
sentences.chinese: 在联欢晚会上我们还欣赏了各个少数民族的歌舞。

sentences.english: Spring Festival Evening also becomes one of the most important TV program for CCTV.
sentences.chinese: 春节联欢晚会也成了每年电视台最重视的节目之一。

sentences.english: After the dinner, we watch the Spring Festival party on television.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭后，我们在电视上看春节联欢晚会。

sentences.english: On a Spring Festival evening party, all looks like meto be same has not looked?
sentences.chinese: 就一场春节联欢晚会，难道都象我一样没有看过？

sentences.english: We wonder whether you would be willing to attend our end-of-the-year party.
sentences.chinese: 不知道您能否赏光，参加我们的年终联欢会。

sentences.english: I make many new friends at the get-together.
sentences.chinese: 我在联欢会上交了许多新朋友。

sentences.english: All the students in the same grade will have a get-together today.
sentences.chinese: 今天所有同年级的同学一起进行联欢。

sentences.english: So we decided to have a get-together party this sum­mer vacation.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们决定将联欢一行暑假。

definition: to gather happily under one roof
social gathering at which those attending take it in turns to perform for the whole group (music, dancing or comedy etc)
